caseTitle: Al-Jehad Trust and another Vs. Federation of Pakistan,etc (Deputy Chairman NAB Case)
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Asif Saeed Khan Khosa
tagline: The Federal Government is directed to fill the vacant offices of the Chairman, National Accountability Bureau (NAB) and the Prosecutor-General Accountability within one month positively failing which Deputy Chairman NAB shall ipso facto and without further ado stand denuded of his authority to continue exercising the delegated powers of the Chairman NAB and performing any other function not conferred upon him by the National Accountability Ordinance, 1999.
